NFT Learning Guide

1

What are NFTs?

NFTs are unique digital tokens that represent ownership of digital items

2

Gas Fees

Minting NFTs requires gas fees - costs vary based on network congestion

3

Royalties

You can earn royalties from future sales of your NFT

4

Storage

NFT metadata is usually stored on decentralized storage like IPFS
